sense.def:
Kdor je
passive
, se ne odzove ali ne pokaže čustev, ko se zgodi nekaj, kar ga zadeva.

seg.quote: She was so enraged that she could remain passive no longer.
They accept passively every law that is passed.

sense.def:
V slovnici je
the passive
glagolska oblika, sestavljena iz pomožnega glagola
be
(biti) in preteklega deležnika glavnega glagola. Na primer, v stavku
She was asked to wait
je glagol
ask
v pasivni obliki.
